content: october 2015 the charts the lozenge cable chart is worked in the round by reading each chart row right to left the 16-stitch chart row is worked once in each round of the wrist warmer row 1-23 are repeated once lozenge cable written instructions for lozenge cable row 1 p1 *k2 p2 repeat from* until 3 sts remain k2 p1 row 2 p1 k2 p2 2/1 lpc 2/1 rpc p2 k2 p1 row 3 p1 k2 p3 k4 p3 k2 p1 row 4 p1 2/1 lpc p2 2/2 rc p2 2/1 rpc p1 row 5 11 13 19 p2 k2 p2 k4 p2 k2 p2 row 6 and 14 p2 2/1 lpc 2/1 rpc 2/1 lpc 2/1 rpc p2 row 7 9 15 17 p3 k4 p2 k4 p3 row 8 and 16 p3 2/2 lc p2 2/2 lc p3 row 10 and 18 p2 2/1 rpc 2/1 lpc 2/1 rpc 2/1 lpc p2 row 12 p2 k2 p2 2/2 rc p2 k2 p2 row 20 p1 2/1 rpc p2 2/2 rc p2 2/1 lpc p1 row 21 repeat row 3 row 22 p1 k2 p2 2/1 rpc 2/1 lpc p2 k2 p1 row 23 repeat row 1 key knit purl 2/1 rpc sl 1 st to cn hold to back k2 p1 from cn 2/1 lpc sl 2 sts to cn hold to front p1 k2 from cn 2/2 rc sl 2 sts to cn hold to back k2 k2 from cn 2/2 lc sl 2 sts to cn hold to front k2 k2 from cn abbreviations and special stitches 2/1 lpc 2-over-1 left purl cross sl 2 to cn hold to front p1 k k knit k2 from cn m1l make 1 left with left needle tip lift strand between 2/1 rpc 2-over-1 right purl cross sl 1 to cn hold to back k2 needles from front to back knit the lifted loop through p1 from cn the back 2/2 lc 2-over-2 left cross m1r make 1 right with left needle tip lift strand between sl 2 to cn hold to front k2 k2 from cn needles from back to front knit the lifted loop through 2/2 rc 2-over-2 right cross sl 2 to cn hold to back k2 k2 the front from cn p p purl bet between
